data.eml:eml: Taraxapseudes n. gen., Taraxapseudes diversus (Lang, 1968) n. comb. and two new species of Atlantapseudes B cescu, 1978 (Tanaidacea: Apseudidae) from Brazil and Madagascar, with a key for the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Kátia Christol Dos, Hansknecht, Tom (2007): Taraxapseudes n. gen., Taraxapseudes diversus (Lang, 1968) n. comb. and two new species of Atlantapseudes B cescu, 1978 (Tanaidacea: Apseudidae) from Brazil and Madagascar, with a key for the genus. Zootaxa 1639: 23-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179617
